text: Upadeshiyude Makan is a 2010 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Joshy Mathew, starring Ganesh Kumar and Divya Unni in the lead roles. http://www.nthwall.com/ml/movie/Upadesiyude- Makan-2010/9465402203http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/7975/malayalam/upadesiyude- makan/index.htm ==Cast== * Ganesh Kumar * Divya Unni ==References== Category:2010 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
